§7§oWelcome to chapter 4!

You just reached the midgame of the pack! Congratulations!

§fThe Shyre Empire's ability to travel is strictly tied to the rocky material I've found in during my experiments with mythic excavation.
Different realmstones can be bound to key travel regions used as ports for the empire, and this ancient rock frame can restabilize existing connections used by this power.

Right click the power stone using a realmstone!
